data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in New England.
In the minute 2, In Foxborough, Montreal push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
New England are pushing forward but Henry Kessler's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 3, Fotis Bazakos awards Montreal a goal kick.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
New England to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
In the minute 7, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Throw-in for Montreal at Gillette Stadium.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to New England.
Kelyn Rowe (New England) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Montreal defenders.
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 10, Kelyn Rowe (New England) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for New England at Gillette Stadium.
At Gillette Stadium, Montreal are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 13, Montreal have a goal kick.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Fotis Bazakos signals a New England throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 16, Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of New England.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Montreal.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Montreal's Orji Okwonkwo gets in a shot on goal at Gillette Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
New England are coming forward and Teal Bunbury gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Montreal at Gillette Stadium.
In Foxborough New England drive forward through Teal Bunbury. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Bojan Krkic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montreal.
In the minute 23, Montreal are caught offside.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Foxborough to check on Orji Okwonkwo, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to New England.
Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for New England, close to Montreal's area.
In the minute 27, Thierry Henry (Montreal) has taken off Orji Okwonkwo who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Lassi Lappalainen is the replacement.
In the minute 28, Important block from the New England defence as Bojan Krkic fires in a strike for Montreal.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Samuel Piette for Montreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alex Buttner.
It seems as if Alex Buttner is unable to continue. DeJuan Jones replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a New England throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New England close to the penalty box.
New England's Kelyn Rowe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, Fotis Bazakos awards Montreal a goal kick.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 38, New England's Gustavo Bou misses with an attempt on goal.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick New England.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
New England's Andrew Farrell has been booked in Foxborough.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Montreal drives forward and Lassi Lappalainen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Kelyn Rowe's header is off-target for New England.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Foxborough, Gustavo Bou of New England is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to New England.
New England are whistled for offside.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Henry Kessler puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
New England's Teal Bunbury has run offside.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Montreal.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Montreal.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Montreal at Gillette Stadium.
Great finish from Gustavo Bou to give New England a 2-0 lead.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 51, Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Zachary Brault Guillard (Montreal) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Binks (Montreal) has received a yellow card from Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 55, Montreal to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In Foxborough Montreal's Bojan Krkic is caught offside.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
The match at Gillette Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jorge Luis Corrales, who is down injured.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
In the minute 59, Jorge Luis Corrales returns to the field for Montreal after picking up a slight injury.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montreal advance rapidly upfield but Fotis Bazakos blows for offside.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Teal Bunbury (New England) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Montreal throw-in in New England's half.
In the minute 63, Bruce Arena (New England) is making a second substitution, with Matt Polster replacing Kelyn Rowe.
Diego Fagundez is replacing Lee Nguyen for the home team.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montreal to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Thierry Henry (Montreal) is making a second change, with Maximiliano Urruti replacing the possibly injured Jorge Luis Corrales.
Goal! Diego Fagundez extends New England's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 65, That's a fine assist from Tajon Buchanan.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
In the minute 69, Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruce Arena is making the team's fourth substitution at Gillette Stadium with Cristian Penilla replacing Teal Bunbury.
Adam Buksa is replacing Gustavo Bou for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Fotis Bazakos blows against New England's Tajon Buchanan for offside.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of New England.
In the minute 74, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cristian Penilla for New England drives towards goal at Gillette Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 77, New England's Scott Caldwell gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montreal defender.
Fotis Bazakos awards Montreal a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Throw-in high up the field for New England in Foxborough.
Montreal make their third substitution with Amar Sejdic replacing Bojan Krkic.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 81, New England's Cristian Penilla is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to New England.
Tajon Buchanan for New England is whistled offside.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Montreal.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Montreal.
In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In the minute 86, Lassi Lappalainen puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
Great play from Maciel to set up the goal.
Diego Fagundez of New England gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
New England to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Adam Buksa (New England) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in New England.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Fotis Bazakos signals a Montreal throw-in in New England's half.
New England's Adam Buksa misses with an attempt on goal.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
